text: Implements a generic interior fog shader.

This SHOP implements a generic interior fog shader. It provides input
fields for every renderer supporting interior fog shading.

To see what interior fog shaders are available for each renderer, click
the

button beside the input field corresponding to each renderer,
then hit

in the Dialog Script window to dump the shader string
into the matching input field.

title: Generic Interior
summary: Implements a generic interior fog shader.
